description.value: A star spawn larva mage has a body composed of a swirling mass of worms. When the creature is killed, the worms fall and begin to disperse. The worms can be harvested for their necrotic and alchemical properties. Use: Using an action, the worms can be thrown at a target within 30 feet. That target must make a DC 15 saving throw or take 3d8 necrotic damage. The worms disperse after the attack, and cannot be retrieved.
